text: The Ottoman Army, which encountered Şahkulu, defeated the Shiite Turkmens, whom they called Kızılbaş, in the Battle of Gökçay in July 1511. Only Ali Pasha died in the war. With this incident, the Shiite issue was eliminated for the moment. ==References== Category:Battles Category:Ottoman Empire
title: Battle of Gökçay (1511)
